name: Rushmore Digital
overview:
Rushmore is a leading provider of online event and delegate/guest management services. Whether youâ€™re managing small events or large conferences, Rushmore has a suitable solution to help streamline your delegate management operations.

Delegate requests are increasingly unique and diverse as are the pressures to deliver the highest quality in event performance. At Rushmore, we know that every event is different and our fully featured suite of tools allows us to present and capture critical information both before and after your event. At the heart of our delegate management solutions are a powerful suite of software tools which are fully customizable. This allows us to support you by delivering a truly bespoke solution tailored to very precise requirements.

Our aim is to provide real support to event managers by enabling technologies that streamline their operations, let them focus on core event management and deliver a truly exceptional delegate experience
